title: Mastery 7+
body:
just increae the amount of S+ games requried.

M7 - 6 games S+
M8 - 12 games S+
M9 - 24 games S+

then with every 10 you should make it in a row

M10 - 2 games S in a row
M20 - 2 games S+ in a row
M30 - 4 games S in a row

thoughts?

replies.body:
No. Just Make an S+ Tier that's tied to ranked so it shows what level of play you've actually earned that mastery at.

I really don't give a fuck if you're a mastery 20 yasuo with 2 million mastery points if you're hardstuck bronze.

Mastery should never have been a system that endorsed Quantity over Quality.
but m7 is already three tokens for s and s+ scores lul, i think you got some numbers mixed up.

I think M30 is a bit OTT, but there should definitely be something higher than M7. Maybe using Quests to unlock Mastery 8 tokens?

Also, I reckon there ought to be something to commemorate those who get 500k and 1 Million and higher Mastery Points.
